actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries relating to high-density fiberboard-core, laminate panels exceeding 0.8 grams per cube centimeter entered from 2001 through 2003.

summary.text: Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries relating to high-density fiberboard-core, laminate panels exceeding 0.8 grams per cube centimeter.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries relating to high-density fiberboard-core, laminate panels exceeding 0.8 grams per cube centimeter entered from 2001 through 2003.
